title: Null and Alternative Hypotheses

title: Comparing 𝛼 and the P-Value
text: Since the problem asks us to use a level of significance of $$0.05$$, 𝛼 $$=$$ $$0.05$$. The $$p-value$$ $$=$$ $$0.1959$$. If 𝛼 > $$p-value$$, reject $$H_0$$ if 𝛼 < $$p-value$$, accept $$H_0$$.

title: Greater Than or Less Than the P-Value
Reject or Accept $$H_0$$ Based on the P-Value

title: Conclusion
text: At a 5% level of significance, from the data, there is insufficient evidence to conclude that the distribution of voter preferences was not the same before and after the earthquake.
speech: At a 5% level of significance, from the data, there is insufficient evidence to conclude that the distribution of voter preferences was not the same before and after the earthquake.
